content: readme *** linapple 2.0***[intro] is linapple? is emulator apple2 (apple][, apple 2, apple 2e etc.) computer series linux other oses sdl support.(sdl means simple directmedia layer written sam lantinga others).linapple works of box, make once run whenever wish.why applelin? yes, first think call such, later linapple seemed better me. one point! is work making possible have comprehensive emulator apple][ computer series linux. original source is applewin (http://applewin.berlios.de) tom charlesworth others. just adapted for: video+audio sdl, functions posix compliant os, linux is particularly.later sort windows support had been added, you may try compile under windows.[install] will show brief instructions compiling installing linapple here.please, install file comprehensive installing tips. sdl1.2, zlib, libcurl libzip are installed your system, can build sources.unpack downloaded linapple archive go src directory:$ cd src run:$ or$ sudo install there is errors, run:$ linapple without being installed:$ cd ..$ ./linapple all files are their places, should an x-window splash screen. press f2 ( f3 alt+f3) before choose disk image drive 1), go work. works well applewin, although needs testing supporting.where install? anywhere feel fit, let linapple with files needs comprehenceive working. files are:splash.bmp - splash screencharset40.bmp- charset apple][ (apple 2e, etc.) text modes.font.bmp- font help screen disk select screens.icon.bmp- nice icon, logo apple][ computer.linapple.conf- configuration file.master.dsk- disk image applesoft(tm) dos 3.3 inside. apple license ( apple.com) details.[using linapple] first start should some nice splashscreen. press f2 start emualtion. master.dsk should load, you see dos3.3(tm) prompt. pressing f3 may select image file name (usually having extensions .dsk, ., .po) slot 6 drive 1. selecting , you either may reboot anew ( pressing f2 key) try boot the inserted disk, type dos3.3(tm) commands view disk contents to run program located it. common dos commands are `catalog' ( `ls' linux), `brun filename' - running binary (b) program, `run filename' - running basic program ( or ). usually, game images alternative to run programs them. may find lot disk images largest oldest ftp apple][ stuff ftp.apple.asimov.net. version 2 linapple are able download such images directly ftp! alt+f3 alt+f4 charging drive 1 drive 2 slot 6 ( you what am :) ) - they are common disk sources apple 2 computer reading/writing files, such system, games, utilities so .to quit emualtor peacefully, press f10. f6 toggles fullscreen mode, scroll lock toggles fullspeed mode. possible key commands linapple are following: f1 - show help screen f2 - cold reset shift+f2 - reload conf file restart f3, f4 - choose image file name floppy disk slot 6 drive 1 2 respectively shift+f3, shift+f4 - same thing apple hard disks ( slot 7)alt+f3,alt+f4 - same f3,f4 using ftp ( linapple.conf configuring ftp accounts)alt+shift+f3, alt+shift+f4 - same shift+f3, shift+f4 using ftp account ( above) f5 - swap drives slot 6 f6 - toggle fullscreen mode f7 - reserved debugger! f8 - save current screen a .bmp file shift+f8 - save settings changable runtime conf file f9 - cycle through various video modes f10 - quit emulator f11 - save current state file, alt+f11 - quick save f12 - reload from file, alt+f12 - quick load ctrl+0..9- fast load state snapshot corresponding number, saved previously ctrl+shift+0..9 - fast save snapshot current snapshot directory corresponding number 0..9 ctrl+f12 - hot reset pause - pause emulator scroll lock - toggle full speed num pad keys: grey + - speed emulator grey - - speed down grey * - normal speed powerful to control behaviour linapple is change different settings linapple.conf file, should located the same directory where linapple is. please, linapple.conf contents know each setting means.note point, too. mouse works a joystick, mouse interface is , when first left-click the window emulator, mouse cursor is grabbed using inside . to release cursor, should click left-mouse button again shift ctrl key pressed. fullscreen mode mouse cursor is always grabbed, release you may to switch windowed mode pressing f6 key. version 1.1 appeared videobenchmark: start linapple -b command-line key see results, this:$ ./linapple -b- run videobenchmark exit emulator. note: fullscreen mode is in linapple.conf, videobenchmark be runned fullscreen mode. version 2 besides ftp support is support changable window sizes ( at end linapple.conf file details). be aware you are running emulator its native mode (560x384) can suffer slowdown you are using old box.[support]wanted:-- need get rid some sound glitches. help!--debugger just owe 9300 lines code applewin debugger. michael pohoreski, are -man, tell .besides debugger.cpp alone, are helper files such debugger_assembler.cpp,debugger_console.cpp, debugger_display.cpp so . who is able port to linapple?--phasor knows does great thing ? please, help adopting to lianpple. sources sound support are mockingboard.cpp soundcore.cpp.sdl audio used. speakers are working in speaker.cpp. may , heh? version 1.1 mockingboard support are done.more testing debugging needed, course. would grateful any comment suggestion regarding linapple, using on oses than linux.[contacts] am krez beom beotiger (kbb), may contact at will my email beotiger@gmail.com beotiger@mail.ruweb-site: http://linapple.sourceforge.netthank very much.long live linux! apple][!--24 march 2012 adbeotiger@mail.ru
